coded_answer.p: In reply to your letter, I would like to answer your questions and give you more information.

Firstly, the hotel in which the group is going to stay is the 'Palace Hotel'. Secondly, the easiest way to travel from the hotel to the conference is by a local bus. There is a bus stop in front of the hotel and a no.31 or 3 will take you directly to the conference. Thirdly, the end-of-conference party wouldwill be a small disco, with a variety of drinks and food provided. Therefore, you couldcan wear something quite casual.
